im moving slow up the block 22s sitting cocked im from the south so its automatic haters getting dropped see me standing in my five deuce stance i might seem young but you gon respect me with this glock in my pants its jayton a young guerilla certified with them hands you thought of stopping slow loud and bangin you better kill all those plans that go for you and your mans im 18 and well known through the h i run with gs so you better pump your breaks
